owner.name: Deepak
owner.title: Computer Science Engineer & Full-Stack Developer
owner.education: B.E. in Computer Science Engineering (2023-2027) at Karpagam College of Engineering
owner.location: Studying in Coimbatore, Native of Karur

bio: I am Deepak Saravanakumar, a passionate Computer Science Engineer and creative developer. I specialize in building innovative full-stack solutions with a focus on user experience and clean code. Currently in my final years at Karpagam College of Engineering, I love turning ideas into reality through code.

projects.name: Agora Marketplace
projects.description: Multi-vendor e-commerce platform connecting customers with product/service vendors, with integrated delivery partner logistics
projects.features: Multi-role dashboards (Customer, Vendor, Delivery Partner, Admin), Product & service listing management, Shopping cart & checkout system

projects.name: HobbyConnect
projects.description: Platform to connect people through local activities and hobbies, enabling users to discover, create, and join events
projects.features: Activity discovery with category filters, Event creation & joining

projects.name: Quantum OS
projects.description: A fully-functional browser-based desktop OS simulation with quantum/cyberpunk aesthetics for portfolio showcase and educational purposes
projects.features: Boot sequence with quantum animation, 17+ built-in apps, 60+ terminal commands, Persistent settings via LocalStorage

projects.name: Startup Simulator AI
projects.description: Transforms raw startup ideas into comprehensive, actionable startup packages (concept, branding, landing page copy) using AI, democratizing startup validation
projects.features: Single idea input â†’ multiple outputs (concept, brand, landing page copy), AI-generated brand names, taglines, color palettes

projects.name: KCE Connect
projects.description: A mobile app to manage campus workflows including leave requests, outpass generation, attendance, and assignments for multiple user roles
projects.features: Multi-role dashboards (Student, Faculty/Tutor, HOD, Warden, Security, Admin), Leave request submission and multi-level approval chain, Outpass QR generation and validation

projects.name: Circuit Vision AI
projects.description: An AI-powered system for automated circuit board analysis and fault detection, helping engineers quickly identify issues in electronic circuits
projects.features: Real-time circuit component detection, Automated fault diagnosis and classification, Visual circuit mapping and analysis, Machine learning-based anomaly detection

currentFocus: Building interactive web experiences and exploring AI integration in portfolio projects
funFacts: I love creating Easter eggs in my projects
This portfolio has 4 secret gradient themes!
I'm inspired by Tony Stark's vision of AI
I have a JARVIS AI assistant in my portfolio!

jarvisPersonality.greeting: Good day, I'm JARVIS - Deepak's portfolio assistant. How may I assist you today?
jarvisPersonality.offTopicResponse: I appreciate your curiosity, but I'm Deepak's portfolio assistant. I can help with information about Deepak, his projects, skills, or navigate this portfolio. I can also answer general questions if you need!
jarvisPersonality.unknownResponse: I'm not quite sure about that. You can ask me about Deepak's education, projects, skills, navigate to different sections, or ask me general questions!
jarvisPersonality.apiLimitMessage: Apologies, but I'm quite busy today. Please try again tomorrow! In the meantime, feel free to explore the portfolio.
jarvisPersonality.tone: Professional, helpful, and slightly witty - inspired by Tony Stark's JARVIS
